_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Trackmania (2020)
author: difiter23@gmail.com
description:
Trackmania 2020 Standalone Server.
See original repository: https://github.com/NoxInmortus/docker-trackmania
Fork by treier57lol: https://github.com/treier57lol/docker-trackmania/tree/pyplanet

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh -x
# TRACKMANIA Installation Script

## Vars
DEDICATED_URL="http://files.v04.maniaplanet.com/server/TrackmaniaServer_Latest.zip"
DEFAULT_MAP="https://trackmania.exchange/tracks/download/1984"
USER="container"
WORKDIR="/mnt/server"

mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}
cd ${WORKDIR}

## Install
apk update && apk add --no-cache unzip wget ca-certificates
wget -v --no-check-certificate ${DEDICATED_URL} -O dedicated.zip
unzip -uo dedicated.zip -d ${WORKDIR}
chmod +x -v ${WORKDIR}/TrackmaniaServer
chown -Rv 1000: ${WORKDIR}

## Cleanup
rm -rfv *.apk *.bat *.exe *.html RemoteControlExamples UserData/Config/dedicated_cfg.default.txt UserData/Maps/MatchSettings/example.txt
rm -rfv /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/cache/apk/* dedicated.zip

## Make folders
mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/Campaigns

## Default map
wget -qO "${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/Campaigns/Training - 01.Map.Gbx" ${DEFAULT_MAP}

## Config
if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Config/${DEDICATED_CFG} ]; then
echo "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
<dedicated>
    <authorization_levels>
		<level>
			<name>${SUPERADMIN_NAME:-SuperAdmin}</name>
			<password>${SUPERADMIN_PWD:-SuperAdmin}</password>
        </level>
		<level>
			<name>${ADMIN_NAME:-Admin}</name>
			<password>${ADMIN_PWD:-Admin}</password>
		</level>
	</authorization_levels>
	
 	<masterserver_account>
		<login>${MASTERSERVER_ACCOUNT_USER:-}</login>
		<password>${MASTERSERVER_ACCOUNT_PWD:-}</password>
	</masterserver_account>
	
	<server_options>
		<name>${SERVER_NAME:-}</name>
		<comment>${COMMENT:-}</comment>
		<hide_server>${HIDE_SERVER:-0}</hide_server>

		<max_players>${MAX_PLAYERS:-32}</max_players>
		<password>${SERVER_PASSWORD:-}</password>
		
		<max_spectators>${MAX_SPECTATORS:-32}</max_spectators>
		<password_spectator>${PASSWORD_SPECTATOR:-}</password_spectator>
	
		<keep_player_slots>${KEEP_PLAYER_SLOTS:-False}</keep_player_slots>
		<ladder_mode>${LADDER_MODE:-forced}</ladder_mode>
		
		<enable_p2p_upload>${P2P_UPLOAD:-True}</enable_p2p_upload>
		<enable_p2p_download>${P2P_DOWNLOAD:-False}</enable_p2p_download>
		
		<callvote_timeout>${CALLVOTE_TIMEOUT:-60000}</callvote_timeout>
		<callvote_ratio>${CALLVOTE_RATIO:-0.5}</callvote_ratio>
		<callvote_ratios>
			<voteratio command=\"Ban\" ratio=\"-1\"/>
		</callvote_ratios>

		<allow_map_download>${ALLOW_MAP_DOWNLOAD:-True}</allow_map_download>
		<autosave_replays>${AUTOSAVE_REPLAYS:-False}</autosave_replays>
		<autosave_validation_replays>${AUTOSAVE_VALIDATION_REPLAYS:-False}</autosave_validation_replays>

		<referee_password>${REFEREE_PASSWORD:-}</referee_password>
		<referee_validation_mode>${REFEREE_VALIDATION_MODE:-0}</referee_validation_mode>

		<use_changing_validation_seed>${USE_CHANGING_VALIDATION_SEED:-False}</use_changing_validation_seed>

		<disable_horns>${DISABLE_HORNS:-False}</disable_horns>
		<clientinputs_maxlatency>${MAX_LATENCY:-0}</clientinputs_maxlatency>
	</server_options>
	
	<system_config>
		<connection_uploadrate>${CONN_UPLOAD_RATE:-102400}</connection_uploadrate>
		<connection_downloadrate>${CONN_DOWNLOAD_RATE:-102400}</connection_downloadrate>

		<workerthreadcount>${WORK_THREAD_COUNT:-2}</workerthreadcount>
		<packetassembly_multithread>${PACKET_THREAD:-True}</packetassembly_multithread>
		<packetassembly_packetsperframe>${PACKETS_PER_FRAME:-60}</packetassembly_packetsperframe>
		<packetassembly_fullpacketsperframe>${FULL_PACKETS_PER_FRAME:-30}</packetassembly_fullpacketsperframe>
		<delayedvisuals_s2c_sendingrate>${DELAYEDVISUAL_SENDING_RATE:-32}</delayedvisuals_s2c_sendingrate>

		<trustclientsimu_c2s_sendingrate>${TRUSTCLIENTSIMU_SENDING_RATE:-64}</trustclientsimu_c2s_sendingrate>

		<allow_spectator_relays>${ALLOW_SPECTATOR_RELAYS:-False}</allow_spectator_relays>

		<p2p_cache_size>${P2P_CACHE_SIZE:-600}</p2p_cache_size>

		<force_ip_address>${FORCE_IP_ADDRESS:-}</force_ip_address>
		<server_port>${TM_SERVER_PORT:-2350}</server_port>
		<client_port>${CLIENT_PORT:-0}</client_port>
		<bind_ip_address>${BIND_IP_ADDRESS:-}</bind_ip_address>
		<use_nat_upnp>${USE_NAT_UPNP:-}</use_nat_upnp>

		<gsp_name>${GSP_NAME:-}</gsp_name>
		<gsp_url>${GSP_URL:-}</gsp_url>

		<xmlrpc_port>${XMLRPC_PORT:-5000}</xmlrpc_port>
		<xmlrpc_allowremote>${XMLRPC_ALLOW_REMOTE:-False}</xmlrpc_allowremote>
		
		<blacklist_url>${BLACKLIST_URL:-}</blacklist_url>
		<guestlist_filename>${GUESTLIST_FILENAME:-}</guestlist_filename>
		<blacklist_filename>${BLACKLIST_FILENAME:-}</blacklist_filename>
		
		<minimum_client_build>${MIN_CLIENT_BUILD:-}</minimum_client_build>

		<disable_coherence_checks>${DISABLE_COHERENCE_CHECKS:-False}</disable_coherence_checks>

		<disable_replay_recording>${DISABLE_REPLAY_RECORDING:-False}</disable_replay_recording>
		<save_all_individual_runs>${SAVE_ALL_INDIVIDUAL_RUNS:-False}</save_all_individual_runs>

		<use_proxy>${USE_PROXY:-False}</use_proxy>
		<proxy_url>${PROXY_URL:-}</proxy_url>
	</system_config>
</dedicated>
" > ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Config/${DEDICATED_CFG}
fi

## MatchSettings
if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/${MATCH_SETTINGS} ]; then
echo "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
<playlist>
	<gameinfos>
		<game_mode>0</game_mode>
		<script_name>Trackmania/TM_TimeAttack_Online</script_name>
	</gameinfos>

	<startindex>0</startindex>
	<map><file>Campaigns/Training - 01.Map.Gbx</file></map>
</playlist>
" > ${WORKDIR}/UserData/Maps/${MATCH_SETTINGS}
fi

## start.sh
if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/start.sh ]; then
echo "#!/bin/sh
echo "--- STARTING SERVER ---"
./TrackmaniaServer /title=Trackmania /dedicated_cfg=dedicated_cfg /game_settings=MatchSettings/matchsettings.xml
while [ "$INPUT_STRING" != "stop" ]
do
  read INPUT_STRING
done
echo "--- STOPPING SERVER ---"
pkill -2 ./TrackmaniaServer
" > ${WORKDIR}/start.sh
fi

chmod +x ${WORKDIR}/start.sh
